ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Money troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: heh...we all have our choices... GO TO FREEPORT...heh...join an orc group from 9-12... when you make 12 or 13...goto North Ro (through the tunnel) and join a
ygData.messageBody:
heh...we all have our choices...

GO TO FREEPORT...heh...join an orc group from 9-12...
when you make 12 or 13...goto North Ro (through the tunnel)
and join a Dervish group until level 15 (don't join the group that actually
spawns Derv)
at 15 goto (yes the goto command is a habit from qbasic) Oasis and join a
group there (since I'm not 15 yet...I can't tell you what to fight....but
this is the current future when I return to virginia

when you are in the derv groups...do an honor loot system (or the random
system) to see who gets the bronze armor...
good money...when backpacks are full or I take an hour to walk a single
step....I go to the nearest merchant and sell...
...generally say 20-35pp an hour...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Akane [SMTP:akane@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 10:10 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Money troubles
>
> Hi all,
>
> I'm a level 9 Ranger (almost 10), and when I get to lvl 20, looking
> forward to a nice wedding. I'm looking to take my time leveling, so I can
> make some good money for a ring, presents, food, etc. Where's the best
> money to be had?
>
